00064 graph::graph(Symbol const &name, TICK init) 
00065   :m_name(name), m_currentTick(init) {
00066 }
00067 
00068 graph::graph(Symbol const &name, boost::property_tree::ptree &conf, TICK init) 
00069   :m_name(name), m_currentTick(init) {
00070   size_t number = add_reactors(conf);
00071   syslog()<<"Created "<<number<<" reactors.";
00072 }
00073 
00074 graph::~graph() {
00075   clear();
00076 }
00077 
00078 TREX::utils::internals::LogEntry graph::syslog(std::string const &context) const {
00079   std::ostringstream oss;
00080   oss<<m_currentTick<<"]["<<m_name.str();
00081   if( !context.empty() )
00082     oss<<"."<<context;
00083 
00084   return m_log->syslog(oss.str());
00085 }
00086 
00087 void graph::clear() {
00088   while( !m_reactors.empty() ) {
00089     syslog()<<"Disconnecting \""<<m_reactors.front()->getName()<<"\" from the graph.";
00090     m_reactors.front()->isolate();
00091     m_reactors.pop_front();
00092   } 
00093   m_quarantined.clear();
00094 }
00095 
00096 long graph::index(graph::reactor_id id) const {
00097   size_t pos = 0;
00098   // not efficient at all !!!
00099   details::reactor_set::const_iterator i;
00100   for(i=m_reactors.begin();
00101       m_reactors.end()!=i && i->get()!=id; ++i, ++pos);
00102   return pos;
00103 }
00104 
00105 graph::reactor_id graph::add_reactor(boost::property_tree::ptree::value_type &description) {
00106   graph *me = this;
00107   TeleoReactor::xml_arg_type 
00108     arg = xml_factory::arg_traits::build(description, me);
00109   boost::shared_ptr<TeleoReactor> tmp(m_factory->produce(arg));
00110   std::pair<details::reactor_set::iterator, bool> ret = m_reactors.insert(tmp);
00111 
00112   if( ret.second ) 
00113     syslog()<<"Reactor \""<<tmp->getName()<<"\" created.";
00114   else
00115     throw MultipleReactors(*this, **(ret.first));                        
00116   return ret.first->get();
00117 }
00118 
00119 graph::reactor_id graph::add_reactor(graph::reactor_id r) {
00120   boost::shared_ptr<TeleoReactor> tmp(r);  
00121   std::pair<details::reactor_set::iterator, bool> ret = m_reactors.insert(tmp);
00122   // As it is an internal call make is silent for now ...
00123   return ret.first->get();
00124 }
00125 
00126 bool graph::kill_reactor(graph::reactor_id r) {
00127   if( null_reactor()!=r ) {
00128     details::reactor_set::iterator pos = m_reactors.find(r->getName()),
00129       pos_q = m_quarantined.find(r->getName());
00130     
00131     if( pos->get()==r ) {
00132       // clean up relations
00133       syslog()<<"Destroying reactor \""<<r->getName()<<"\".";
00134       m_reactors.erase(pos);
00135       if( pos_q->get()==r )
00136        m_quarantined.erase(pos_q);
00137       return true;
00138     }
00139   }
00140   return false;
00141 }
00142 
00143 graph::reactor_id graph::isolate(graph::reactor_id r) const {
00144   if( null_reactor()!=r ) {
00145     details::reactor_set::const_iterator pos = m_reactors.find(r->getName());
00146     if( pos->get()==r ) {
00147       syslog()<<"Putting reactor\""<<r->getName()<<"\" in quarantine.";
00148       r->isolate();
00149       m_quarantined.insert(*pos);
00150       return r;
00151     }
00152   }
00153   return null_reactor();
00154 }
00155 
00156 size_t graph::cleanup() {
00157   size_t ret =0;
00158   for(; !m_quarantined.empty(); ++ret)
00159     kill_reactor(m_quarantined.front().get());
00160   return ret;
00161 }  
00162 
00163 details::timeline_set::iterator graph::get_timeline(Symbol const &tl) {
00164   details::timeline *cand = new details::timeline(m_currentTick, tl);
00165   std::pair<details::timeline_set::iterator, bool>
00166     ret = m_timelines.insert(cand);
00167   if( ret.second ) 
00168     syslog()<<"Timeline \""<<tl.str()<<"\" created.";
00169   else
00170     delete cand;
00171   return ret.first;
00172 }
00173 
00174 graph::size_type graph::count_relations() const {
00175   size_t res = 0;
00176   for(details::timeline_set::const_iterator i=m_timelines.begin();
00177       m_timelines.end()!=i; ++i )
00178     res += (*i)->size();
00179   return res;
00180 }
00181 
00182 
00183 bool graph::assign(graph::reactor_id r, Symbol const &timeline, bool controllable) {
00184   details::timeline_set::iterator tl = get_timeline(timeline);
00185   try {
00186     internal_check(r, **tl);
00187     return (*tl)->assign(*r, controllable);
00188   } catch(timeline_failure const &err) {
00189     return r->failed_internal(timeline, err);
00190   }
00191 }
00192 
00193 bool graph::subscribe(reactor_id r, Symbol const &timeline, bool control) {
00194   details::timeline_set::iterator tl = get_timeline(timeline);
00195   try {
00196     external_check(r, **tl);
00197     return (*tl)->subscribe(*r, control);
00198   } catch(timeline_failure const &err) {
00199     return r->failed_external(timeline, err);
00200   }
00201 }

00214 graph::timelines_listener::timelines_listener(graph::xml_factory::argument_type const &arg)
00215   :m_graph(*(arg.second)){
00216   m_graph.m_listeners.insert(this);

00219 graph::timelines_listener::~timelines_listener() {
00220   m_graph.m_listeners.erase(this);
00221 }

00223 // manpipulators
00224 void graph::timelines_listener::initialize() {
00225   for(details::timeline_set::const_iterator tl=m_graph.m_timelines.begin();
00226       m_graph.m_timelines.end()!=tl; ++tl)
00227     declared(**tl);
00228 }
